Reviews.Content: august location hotel quite away madrid centre want wifi pay 16 park car breakfast also also extra costs worth money

Reviews.Content: plaza business hotel good location stayed executive room couple weeks service good laundry came back nice flowers spanish ham bread served breakfast exceptional quality loved bread room service 2030 almost impossible get anything eat food good though definitely worth waiting

Reviews.Content: staff excellent helpful rooms surprisingly large roomy kingsized bed comfortable love bathroom 5star bathroom clean complete kit guests havent seen hotel long aside lotion shower cap kit shaving kit etc also provided bathrobes slippers use shower fantastic hotel close metro took 10 minutes get heart madrid convenient
Reviews.Author: TPANDAV

Reviews.Content: hotel rather clean location short walk metro train station chamartin close use train station planning day trip stayed room daughter little cramped okay breakfast variety
Reviews.Author: Lasc

Reviews.Content: stayed one night away business hotel convenient area close central bus station near underground 5th floor room found little small side although contained usual expectations desk mini bar tv etc everything packed small space making difficult relax hotel ok one night stay especially travelling business visiting madrid weekend would suggest look elsewhere unless need location price right
Reviews.Author: Steve33Oxford

Reviews.Content: stayed business four nights must smallest single room class hotel known world hotel full must plenty right better room could offered restaurant dinner menu choices virtually deserted surprising ate buffet breakfast ok want cold meats andor bread pastries claim offer hot breakfast well idea hot mine one small heat lamp simply keep five dishes even warm day played smart one morning waited arrival fresh plate fried eggs kitchen stone cold theyd cooked night ac room broken arrived arrived amazingly quickly literally within five minutes fixed using bathroom floor wifi worked well cheap compared hotels fair didnt try facilities may well excellent
Reviews.Author: Guido_T

Reviews.Content: first time madrid stayed hotel per spanish friends recommendation pleased location center madrid close enough metro line across street hotel take u downtown 15 mins great away bustling tourists party hotel offered ambiance jacuzzi steam sauna top floor higher floors nice big window view city bus line right across streets relied buses late nights metro closed would stay prices worth hotel compared downtown location clean comfortable yes would stay

Reviews.Content: stayed business although spent hardly time seemed nice modern hotel lovely room bathroom

Reviews.Content: stayed one night cost double single purpose visit purely attend football match bernabeu point view extremely convenient close metro 1520 min walk straight line fault hotel modern spotless room huge adequate buffet breakfast fine selection lobby bar beer reasonable well away main attractions madrid perfect choice bernabeu visit

Reviews.Content: good value money lot better guests stayed hotel three nights special weekend break offer originally allocated tiny twin room immediately assigned larger room requested room quite basic would expect 4star hotel point view furnishings fittings however room clean bathroom cleaned replenished toiletries towels every breakfast buffet well stocked basics nothing special bar lounge area time particular area could great meeting point guests well lit 50 irish people group would well worthwhile facility operating cafeteria sister europe hotel reached going art gallery corridor people relaxed drink coffee nice italian restaurant across road cafeteria hotel located quiet area couple local shops pharmacy shoe shop hotel well served 20 bus comes frequently 1 euro city centre great value taxi journey cost us 10 euro back bus hotel grand price paid visiting madrid would prefer stay closer city centre
